snippet: The pianist and bandleader Eddie Palmieri has been influenced by Latin music, jazz, African rhythms and classical composers and has, in turn, affected Latin music and jazz.
abstract: Veteran Latin jazz pianist and bandleader Eddie Palmieri will be recognized for his influential body of work; is scheduled to be subject of Jazz at Lincoln Center retrospective, will perform at show at Kennedy Center in Washington, and will be inducted in National Endowment for the Arts as 'jazz master.'
lead_paragraph: The pianist and bandleader Eddie Palmieri has been influenced by Latin music, jazz, African rhythms and classical composers and has, in turn, affected Latin music and jazz.

headline.seo: Eddie Palmieri Ties Together Many Musical Genres
headline.main: Borders and Epochs, Dissolving at His Keyboard
headline.print_headline: Borders and Epochs, Dissolving at His Keyboard

keywords.value: Kennedy, John F, Center for the Performing Arts
keywords.name: organizations
